children.value: The available skip options in Custom Firewall rules are the following:
Skip the remaining Custom Rules (current ruleset)
Skips the remaining rules in the current ruleset.
Skips the execution of one or more phases. Based on the phases you can skip, this option effectively allows you to skip
. When skipping a phase, both the account and zone-level entry point rulesets of the phase will be skipped.
The phases you can skip are the following:
Skips specific security products that are not based on the Ruleset Engine. The products you can skip are the following:
The API values are case sensitive.
